Attack Potion.Name: Attack Potion
Attack Potion.Description: Add 1 of 3 random Attack cards to your hand it costs 0 this turn.

Blessing of the Forge.Name: Blessing of the Forge
Blessing of the Forge.Description: Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

Blood Potion.Name: Blood Potion
Blood Potion.Description: Heal for 20% of your Max HP.

Colorless Potion.Name: Colorless Potion
Colorless Potion.Description: Choose 1 of 3 random Colorless cards to add to your hand it costs 0 this turn.

Cunning Potion.Name: Cunning Potion
Cunning Potion.Description: Add 3 Upgraded Shivs to your hand.

Distilled Chaos.Name: Distilled Chaos
Distilled Chaos.Description: Play the top 3 cards of your draw pile.

Duplication Potion.Name: Duplication Potion
Duplication Potion.Description: This turn your next card is played twice.

Elixir.Name: Elixir
Elixir.Description: Exhaust any number of cards in your hand.

Entropic Brew.Name: Entropic Brew
Entropic Brew.Description: Fill all your empty potion slots with random potions.

Essence of Darkness.Name: Essence of Darkness
Essence of Darkness.Description: Channel 1 Dark for each orb slot.

Fairy in a Bottle.Name: Fairy in a Bottle
Fairy in a Bottle.Description: When you would die heal to 30% of your Max HP instead and discard this potion.

Flex Potion.Name: Flex Potion
Flex Potion.Description: Gain 5 Strength. At the end of your turn

Gambler's Brew.Name: Gambler's Brew
Gambler's Brew.Description: Discard any number of cards then draw that many.

Liquid Memories.Name: Liquid Memories
Liquid Memories.Description: Choose a card in your discard pile and return it to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

Power Potion.Name: Power Potion
Power Potion.Description: Add 1 of 3 random Power cards to your hand it costs 0 this turn.

Skill Potion.Name: Skill Potion
Skill Potion.Description: Add 1 of 3 random Skill cards to your hand it costs 0 this turn.

Smoke Bomb.Name: Smoke Bomb
Smoke Bomb.Description: Escape from a non-boss combat. Receive no rewards.

Snecko Oil.Name: Snecko Oil
Snecko Oil.Description: Draw 5 cards. Randomize the costs of all cards in your hand for the rest of the combat.

Speed Potion.Name: Speed Potion
Speed Potion.Description: Gain 5  Dexterity. At the end of your turn lose 5  Dexterity.
